com.adience.adboost.core

Class AdsReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adience.adboost.core.AdsReporter

  • public class AdsReporter
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for reporting to the SDK service any new information on ads.

    • Method Detail

      • adReceived

        public static void adReceived(Context context,
              java.lang.String adNetwork,
              AdsReporter.AdType adType,
              byte[] adData,
              boolean ageUsed,
              boolean genderUsed)
        Signal that an ad request has been responded.
        Parameters:
        context - The context for the operation.
        adNetwork - The ad network that responded to the request.
        adType - The type of the ad.
        adData - The ad data (screenshot from the ad) if required, or null otherwise.
        ageUsed - Whether the age was provided to the ad network in this request.
        genderUsed - Whether the gender was provided to the ad network in this request.

      • adFailed

        public static void adFailed(Context context,
            java.lang.String adNetwork,
            AdsReporter.AdType adType,
            boolean ageUsed,
            boolean genderUsed)
        Signal that the an ad request has failed.
        Parameters:
        context - The context for the operation.
        adNetwork - The ad network destined to receive the request.
        adType - The type of the ad.
        ageUsed - Whether the age was provided to the ad network in this request.
        genderUsed - Whether the gender was provided to the ad network in this request.

      • adClicked

        public static void adClicked(Context context,
             java.lang.String adNetwork,
             AdsReporter.AdType adType,
             boolean ageUsed,
             boolean genderUsed)
        Signal that an ad was clicked.
        Parameters:
        context - The context for the operation.
        adNetwork - The ad network whose ad was clicked.
        adType - The type of the ad.
        ageUsed - Whether the age was provided to the ad network in this request.
        genderUsed - Whether the gender was provided to the ad network in this request.
